column5: Looking for someone to resew my boat cover, stitching is getting worn and would like it to be restitched while it retains its form. 15' Legend cover.  Thanks, Dave
JT Tops, in Midland, did my full main Lund top for a 100 bucks... including pulling all the bars and putting them back in. Probably a bit of a drive though, gotta be someone in the GTA.
Barrie Tent and Awning.  Another a bit out of your way but do good work for reasonable prices.
